name: Sotiria Bellou
description: '''Sotiria Bellou''' ({{langx|el|Σωτηρία Μπέλλου}}) (August 22, 1921 – August 27, 1997) was a [[Greeks|Greek]] singer and performer of the ''[[rebetiko]]'' style of music. She was one of the most famous ''rebetisa'' of all, mentioned in many music guides, and a contributor to the 1984 British Documentary entitled [[Music of the Outsiders]]. On March 14, 2010, [[Alpha TV]] ranked Bellou the 22nd top-certified female artist in the nation's phonographic era (since 1960).
